= Introduction =
 * Gamnet is boost base network framework

= GETTING STARTED =
== Getting '_'Gamnet'_ source code ==
 * You can get the source code from svn see below page :
  https://code.google.com/p/gamnet/source/checkout
 * 'gamnet' directory includes all of the source codes of 'Gamnet' besides tools.
== Install build essential ==
=== in linux(ubuntu) ===
 * Frist, You should install gdebi-core package to install custom build-essential,  'gamnet-linux-build-essential.deb' package includes every things needed for 'gamnet' framework.

  # $ sudo apt-get update
  # $ sudo apt-get install gdebi-core
 * move to 'gamnet' directory and execute 'gdebi' to install build essential
  {{{
$ cd gamnet/linux-build-essential
$ ls
build.sh  control  gamnet-linux-build-essential.deb  postinst  src
$ sudo gdebi gamnet-linux-build-essential.deb
  }}}
